class rws_client.RWSClient(rws_server_address, username='Default User', password='robotics')

Bases: object

Implements a simple interface for a user who aims to build his/her own application.

It contains documented methods, each having a name corresponding to what it does.

close_http_session()
get_controller_actions()

Returns actions available on controller resources

get_controller_resources()

Returns controller resources

get_file_service_resources()

Returns file service resources

get_rapid_execution_actions()

Returns available actions on RAPID execution

get_rapid_execution_state(continue_on_err='None')

Returns RAPID execution state

Parameters

continue_on_err – Continue on error [‘1’, ‘0’, ‘None’]

get_rapid_system_resources()

Returns RAPID resources

get_rapid_variable_data(task, module, variable)

Returns RAPID variable state

Parameters

  • task – RAPID task wherin the variable is defined []

  • module – RAPID module wherin the variable is defined []

  • variable – Name of the RAPID variable []

get_robotware_services()

Returns robotware services

get_service_list()

Returns the services list

get_subscription_actions()

get_user_actions()

user actions

get_user_resources(user_type='None')

Returns user ressources

Parameters

user_type – Type of user [‘self’, ‘None’]

logout()

Performs logging out

reset_rapid_program_pointer_to_main()

Resets the program pointer (RAPID) to main procedure (PROC main). The robot has to be in ‘Auto’ mode.

start_rapid_execution(regain='continue', execmode='continue', cycle='once', condition='none', stopatbp='disabled', alltaskbytsp='false')

Starts a RAPID execution. The robot has to be in ‘Auto’ mode.

Parameters

  • regain – Regain [‘continue’, ‘regain’, ‘clear’]

  • execmode – Execution mode [‘continue’, ‘stepin’, ‘stepover’, ‘stepout’, ‘stepback’, ‘steplast’, ‘stepmotion’]

  • cycle – Cycle [‘forever’, ‘asis’, ‘once’]

  • condition – Condition [‘none’, ‘callchain’]

  • stopatbp – Stop execution at breakpoint [‘disabled’, ‘enabled’]

  • alltaskbytsp – alltaskbytsp [‘true’, ‘false’]

start_rapid_execution_from_prod_entry()

Starts a RAPID execution from a production entry

stop_rapid_execution(stopmode='stop', usetsp='normal')

Stops a RAPID execution. The robot has to be in ‘Auto’ mode.

Parameters

  • stopmode – Stop mode [‘cycle’, ‘instr’, ‘stop’, ‘qstop’]

  • usetsp – Use tsp [‘normal’, ‘alltsk’]

subscribe_on_resources(data_resources)

Subscribe on resources

update_rapid_variable_current_value(task, module, variable, value='true')

Update the current value of a RAPID variable

Parameters

  • task – RAPID task wherin the variable is defined []

  • module – RAPID module wherin the variable is defined []

  • variable – Name of the RAPID variable []

  • value – Value to be written [‘boolean’, ‘num’, ‘string’]
